website_summaries.verdict: The 3DS XL's improved 3D head-tracking is a big step up and its performance boost more makes a noticeable difference. A few head-scratching design choices prevent us from falling for the New 3DS XL, but this is still the best Nintendo portable to get.
pros: The 3D screens are improved by new face-tracking, and the larger size offers a less cramped viewing experience
Internal tweaks and updates add a behind-the-scenes boost
cons: The poor battery life hasn't improved
Having to remove the back of the console to change the SD card is a poor design choice and the legacy data transfer process is infuriating
Also, there's no AC charger in the box -- you have to buy one separately

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This 3ds looks amazing, runs good, no problems here and I'm very happy with it. Time for fire emblem and smash
customer_reviews.author: Philippe Medor

customer_reviews.title: No.. terrible! I was tricked..
customer_reviews.text: So it says "New Nintendo 3DS XL - Galaxy" i ordered it without the adapter.. waited a week... i received a USED Galaxy WITH an adapter... ?? we tested it out, the top screen was wobbly, didnt stay in place. And also, the sound didnt work! TAKING IT BACK AS SOON AS WE CAN! DO NOT GET FOOLED INTO THIS PRODUCT!!!! I dont know how people can review this as a good product unless they do hand out good ones and hand out bad ones when they want to? I dont understand. So 1 star! WOULDNT RECCOMEND BUYING OFF THESE PEOPLE EVER!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Great console for on-the-go gaming
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from my old dsi to this and the improvements are amazing. At first the holding the 3ds xl made my hands hurt but the more I've played it the less it hurts. Great quality build doesn't feel like a kids toy which is great. Huge library of games makes it that you can never get bored of playing this thing. Again really like the premium feel of the build. Recommend getting all the Mario, Pokémon, and Zelda games. Also I love that it can play DS and 3ds games.
customer_reviews.author: sael

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto
customer_reviews.text: Came very fast and in perfect working condition. I thought it was strange that these don't come with a charger or even a basic stylus, but that was easily remedied. I last had a Gameboy advanced so this is a huge upgrade for me I'm still figuring out all you can do on it (other than play Pokemon). Charge holds for several days through 2-3 hours of play each day and turning it off and on for a few minutes randomly throughout the day (I bring it to work to pass the time). Design is really pretty, overall I love it and I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome to look at
customer_reviews.text: So glad I finally gave in and bought one. I used to LOVE my original DS and with a lot of travel for work and whatnot coming up I wanted to invest in a new portable game system. So far the 3ds is working great! The galaxy design looks beautiful and the 3D effect looks so cool. I like that it can also be adjusted/turned off, because sometimes it doesn’t work well with my eyes. There’s a very wide range of games available for it too. I was torn between the 3ds and the switch but I’m glad I picked the 3ds!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa C.

customer_reviews.title: Came broken...
customer_reviews.text: I mean it looked nice, but aside from that, the console came broken. It wouldn’t hold a charge, in fact it wouldn’t charge at all. I googled the symptoms and it came up as a blown fuse, could’ve fixed it myself but honestly, why would I pay more to FIX a brand new console that came broken. I sent it back, obviously, and that was that. I’m sure this isn’t something that commonly happens, I think I just got the unlucky strike here, but I’m still disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Balthazar Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews on this and just have to laugh! Saw foreign purchasers complaining because it doesn’t play their games. Here’s a secret: this is a NORTH AMERICAN REGION 3DS! Which means it only plays games in this region! Now that that is cleared up; this was brand new; box itself had a minor ding in a corner, but that didn’t matter as the system itself was totally fine and protected. It also showed up way sooner than expected! Thank you so much! I’m happy to have a working 3DS again! (I wore my old one out I’d had for 9 years)
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Long live the 3ds.
customer_reviews.text: Best version of the 3ds where the 3d is amazing and very much enjoyable. A 3ds is also a ds so you have 1000s of games to choose from. This is the ultimate portable gaming machine. Switch? It's great but it's not this. This machine is the reason Nintendo remain a contender though the Wii U was a bust. I will eventually get a Switch but I'm having so much fun here, it will take a while to upgrade. Long live Nintendo long live the 3ds.
customer_reviews.author: JERMIN

customer_reviews.title: The BEST 3DS I've had!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the regular, and XL 3DS, and thought I would never get a New 3DS XL until I saw the Galaxy style here, and I must say that after upgrading to this, I have to admit I am very happy with my decision. I do not approve well on having to pay full price for this, seeing as it is an upgraded 3DS, but the brighter, larger screens, louder speakers, faster processor, and it being more comfortable to hold, I can forgive the steep price and say this is worth getting!
customer_reviews.author: Willie G.R.Top Contributor: Amiibo

customer_reviews.title: i bought this on amazon warehouse deal and i got a good deal and a good shape item
customer_reviews.text: I bought as an acceptable item from the amazon warehouse and I was happy the item did have 2 things wrong .But they were so small it did not effect anything and I got a charger with if anyone knows the device brand new did not come with a charger so could have done with the 2 small things wrong but as I said the things were so small it did not effect anything about it . In short I am happy with what I have
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Was great till we lost it, now $100 price jump - why?
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had this for 2 months before she left it in a hotel and they said they couldn't find it. She loved it and it worked great. I just wanted to replace it and notice that the price for the same item from the same seller has gone up from $174 to $274 in 2 years. Shouldn't it get cheaper if anything?
customer_reviews.author: Baseball Fan

customer_reviews.title: It's official.
customer_reviews.text: Let's skip the long review because this a official Nintendo New 3DS XL and it as amazing as it should be. I will say that larger screen is like a luxury and the galaxy skin is nice on the eyes and very unique looking. If your looking for a 3DS to feel proud of owning, here you go.
customer_reviews.author: Trystan D Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Black screen
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas. He loved it. Beautiful graphics. After only 6 months the screen is black. The sound is on but the screen is just black. Reading other comments I see this is a big problem. This was one of his big Christmas gifts and now he can’t use it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer carbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Broken...AGAIN.
customer_reviews.text: This product is an A+ for fun, and an F for manufacturing quality. We have purchased TWO of these fang things within the last 3 years (totaling $600ish?) and they just can't hold up. We have thr screen protectors, cases, you name it. My only regret is wasting money on downloading games; I cannot even sell games to recoup my costs. Wish my son wasn't begging for another one. I have ZERO interest burning through more money on these things.
customer_reviews.author: ACB MGMT

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up: Arrived on time and didn't have saturated screens
customer_reviews.text: The Galaxy Style "New" Nintendo 3ds xl that I had ordered arrived on time without any scratches to the console as well as the box. I really like the beautiful design of the galaxy, as well as the inner dark blue coloration that matched it on the inside. The screen did not have any dead pixels and I'm guessing that you are more likely to get IPS screens, but it is usually a gamble with the 3ds. Overall I give this product a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and works well, until it crashes.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and smooth game play, until it crashes. I've been playing it for a couple of weeks now and have around 10 hours invested. So far it has crashed on me about 6 times. I don't know if it is the system or something else, but I can't give a good rating.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your "on the go" gaming.
customer_reviews.text: Now, I'm someone who's played basically every iteration of the portable Nintendo console, starting with the classic Gameboy, and going all the way up to this current generation, and they're always just... fun! Having the additional shoulder buttons and the nub give added gameplay possibilities for games to come, along with the current "New 3DS only" games, like a few newer titles as well as some older SNES games, like A Link to the Past. 👌🏻 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Mint condition
customer_reviews.text: No scare he’s no nothing. Bought new and it was 100% new and even came with the original box and works like a dream. So happy with what I received
customer_reviews.author: Luka

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing, and an almost perfect product
customer_reviews.text: The New Nintendo 3DS that I received is aesthetically in mint condition! I cannot be happier with how it looks! The only thing that I’m unhappy with is that the game card slot is damaged. It won’t read any 3DS or DS games, and when you look inside the game card slot it’s easy to see why. I’m currently waiting on a new game card slot to arrive in the mail, and it should be a relatively easy fix once it arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Stark

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but lags and unreadable cards
customer_reviews.text: Came in great surface condition. Although, it does not read game cards sometimes and that can be pretty frustrating as I have to insert and take out the game card multiple times before it will read. Probably will eventually stop reading them all together. Very unfortunate as I paid almost new price for this system.
customer_reviews.author: Nikole

customer_reviews.title: Kinda let down.
customer_reviews.text: So I got it in the mail and it wouldn't turn on or charge. I heard a popping noise every time I hit the power button. Called Nintendo 20 minutes after I received it and now it's going back for repairs. I don't think I should blame the seller, but I did pay a hefty price for it, only for it to be sent back to the manufacturer to be repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, works great.
customer_reviews.text: I love the galaxy design that the 3ds has; i wish the galaxy design was on the inside too. If it was on the inside then it should be slightly different looking stars if the outside galaxy was kept. Haven't had a single issue with this product thus far. Anyone who likes the galaxy design should not hesitate to try it out.
customer_reviews.author: The Turtle

customer_reviews.title: This 3DS is so cool! It came very shiny and makes the design ...
customer_reviews.text: This 3DS is so cool! It came very shiny and makes the design look even better! It works great too! If you buy any designed new 3DS, I recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Zdock44

customer_reviews.title: Excellent system. I definitely fell for the Galaxy style
customer_reviews.text: Excellent system. I definitely fell for the Galaxy style. I was torn between a New 3DS XL and a New 2DS XL. At the time the color I wanted for the 2DS XL was not available so I went ahead and got this one. This is a bit top heavy and I don't like that the game slot is exposed where as the 2DS slot is protected. For those reasons I gave it one less star, but overall it's a great system, the 3D looks great, but if you don't care much about that I recommend the New 2DS XL at a lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another amazing product from Nintendo
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves the Nintendo 3DS XL Galaxy! Amazing picture resolution with such a small device. Easy to use. My eight year old has been using it on his own without any difficulty. Great entertainment during long car rides.
customer_reviews.author: she who loves to shop

customer_reviews.title: The 3ds experience in a larger and fancier Galaxy package.
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy and harder to grab compared to my old ds. But very solid build quality compared to the ds or the new 2ds. Sound quality is good. Screen lottery was IPS top, TN bottom. The hinges are a little stiffer and top heavy. Battery is about 5 hours on 2 level brightness with power save ON. The stylus is a bit small for my average sized hand. 3ds feature is a gimmick really.
customer_reviews.author: Hamzah J.

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this 3DSxl the image really doesn't do it any ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this 3DSxl the image really doesn't do it any justice. It is much nicer in person, and it works beautifully. It comes with all the equipment, like the instructions, collectible cards you can use to play with your 3DS' camera. Very interactive, anything you would expect from any 3DS XL
customer_reviews.author: AllabouttheTruth

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I had the original 3DS from the first line back in 2011, but as I got older the buttons became too small for my hands. So I bought this, it looks amazing and it plays well. The buttons are bigger too, the only issue is that it doesn't come with an AC Adapter but luckily, I still kept my old USB adapter so it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not all is what it seems
customer_reviews.text: Delivered right on time, package was clean, and works well. To be honest the design looks better on the box but it still looks nice. Was worried when looking at the box to find it was region locked to Saudi Arabia, Malaysia, Singapore and UAE but did successful run a North American cartridge of Majora's Mask. Also the SD card seemed to be bigger than the one in my old new 3ds xl (damn titles) so someone definitely opened it up and gave me a better SD and a North American 3ds
customer_reviews.author: Micah Topete

customer_reviews.title: More than worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: After being stuck with the Nintendo DSi XL for so long, I'm glad I picked up this stellar version of the 3DS. The new UI is excellent, 3D is actually really good (however it can be disorienting for some) and the games available are almost always of great quality. Glad to've finally gotten back into the recent gaming scene with this great Nintendo product! (This graphic also pairs well with the gold trim HORI Pikachu Premium Gold Protector case. Though, if you're not a Pokemon fan, I don't quite know what else to recommend that would compliment the Galaxy graphic.)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY FROM HERE. Unsatisfied and annoyed customer.
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving one star cause zero isn’t an option. I ordered this 3ds xl and I was ecstatic, took a couple extra days to get to my house, no biggie. I open it, and it doesn’t power up. No problem it’s probably dead. Oh good, the charger doesn’t work. So I buy a new charger, only to find out the ds won’t turn on, it only charged. So I open the back to find out just how destroyed the console is. All I’ve wanted to do is play Pokémon games since the outbreak started and I spent 180$ on an expensive paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Christian.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: The colors of this console are really pretty and the processing is much better than my old 3DS. I was a little skeptical at first and thought it was a bit expensive. After using it I understand why and that it was worth the money I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Snowbellekitty

customer_reviews.title: ... this in a smashed box and it was so dirty. It looked like it had been opened and ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this in a smashed box and it was so dirty. It looked like it had been opened and played with by a bunch of people while they were eating lunch. Greasy screens, dirty cracks. Was hoping to have a game system that was pristine and new since that is what was ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo Best Game System Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This Nintendo is great! It picks up street passes easily and is the best Nintendo I have! here is the link for it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Super quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and it’s beautiful overall. I only have played a bit but the 3D is neat. I bite the bullet and spurlged on this beauty. Fun times!!!
customer_reviews.author: D Villalobos

customer_reviews.title: Love my 3DS!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely expensive, but worth it. The galaxy style is beautiful, it's comfortable enough, and the sound and picture quality has never looked better on a handheld Nintendo system (excluding the Switch)> The 3DS has a great assortment of games, and they're starting to drop in price too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle Plesz

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: Got it in December and my son LOVED it! 2 months later it stopped charging. Bought a new charger - same thing. Looked online and apparently this is common, but how do I get it fixed? The Nintendo web site said you have to ship it to them (that costs money) and they’ll fix it - but they charge you to fix it??!!
customer_reviews.author: E. M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to play, easy to see
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to be my serious 3DS system, as the 3DS I had bought locally had some issues with pressing the B button, and since I play Kirby games a lot, and the B button is the Attack button, this was an issue. That being said, I love it! I have to admit that the power button's placement took some getting used to, and I had to wiggle the charger cable to get it to work, but it's an absolute dream aside from that.
customer_reviews.author: catluvr2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my GF, it's nice, but definitely a product for childs or small hands people, I've been trying to play and controls seems too small for me hahahaha But she's really happy and she loves it, for me that's all that matters. The console itself works great, the only thing I found is that when you use glasses, the IR that follows your eyes to adjust the 3D effect tends to fail, it's weird but it's fine...
customer_reviews.author: Luis C. Cely

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing, have been playing Pokemon yellow and Moon basically non stop. Battery life is excellent when wifi is off and brightness is at a practical level.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hallberg

customer_reviews.title: Bought a brand new one for a gift and when ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a brand new one for a gift and when they got it they opened it up for it to be one that already had been used and parental settings set so it can't be used until we contact nintendo.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Hopp

customer_reviews.title: Nice design and other features
customer_reviews.text: Works very similar to the older 3DS, with some adjustments like the power-saver option and a better camera. I was very pleased to have one after my older version broke, and this one seems to be worth it. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pleased
customer_reviews.text: They say two day shipping for prime but this came in three days? Other than that the system is beautiful and works way nicer than my 2DS did, and I love the bigger screens. Thanks Prime Day!
customer_reviews.author: SlickyTheSlug

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th 3ds ive had. 3ds, 3ds xl, new 3ds(super mario land edition), and now this bad boy. The design is beautiful and you would think its a matte finiah from the photos bit it's actually glossy. Which makes it 10x more beautiful. A+ love it
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful screens and 3D!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome gaming system! I love how big the screen is and the 3D with the eye tracking is phenomenal! I had previously played on a Nintendo DS system and it is garbage compared to the 3DS XL. The touchscreen is not too sensitive, but just sensitive enough. It is seriously a great system! The galaxy design is truly stunning.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: My wife bought me this 3ds xl and I really enjoy the way it feels in the hand
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my birthday. My 2ds had found its way into the sink....one of my three boys did it :( I was heartbroken. I am not a huge gamer and actually bought the 2ds to play the new Animal Crossing New Leaf when it was released. My wife bought me this 3ds xl and I really enjoy the way it feels in the hand. It did take some getting used to because of the size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Sold me broken item. The thing would freeze up sometime not even turn on. I tried to play games on it and it wouldn’t even recognize it. Tried multiple other games with the same result. Scratched up and also when it arrived I had to pop the bottom back in. Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: Malik McClamy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this console in used-very good condition for $140 or so. I was pleasantly surprised to find that it’s actually more like “Like New” condition. I don’t have any defects and it works perfectly! The design is beautiful and the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece of technology. Works amazing, the buttons are perfectly set to make gameplay as smooth as possible. The blue on this model is sparkly to match with the galaxy theme, and is overall aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Shalene

customer_reviews.title: Great item!  Happy buyer!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son's 11th birthday. He is THRILLED with it! He loves the galaxy design, and it works wonderfully. We are happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: AsherB

customer_reviews.title: Great Device. Long Battery Life. Strong Parental Internet Controls.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, has a really long battery life which is great. I really love that there is the ability to put tight parental controls on the device since it has internet access and potential to connect with others. That was what convinced me to buy it actually. My son loves it and will get a lot of use out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Renihan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the design, and apparently so did the thief who stole it from my home. Was great while I had it though! At this point I would probably just buy the new 2DS or a Switch though.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it from Amazon Warehouse Deals for an amazing price and it came practically new. Only thing that was damaged was the packaging but that was mentioned in the description so that wasn't a problem. A good upgrade from my old 3ds xl. Totally worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: My favorite handheld now.
customer_reviews.text: I waited forever to get one of these but am glad I got one. The battery lasts forever and the design upgrades are worlds better than previous versions of the DS line. I also like the style of the galaxy look.
customer_reviews.author: J. D. Garner

customer_reviews.title: I love the galaxy design on this
customer_reviews.text: I love the galaxy design on this. And this is my favorite handheld Nintendo system. The switch does not replace the DS is my opinion as this portability just can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Park Dinger

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly new device, set up relatively quickly and without hassle, and is still working great! I've had it for over a year now, and the only issue I have is using the 3D function while playing one particular game. It's the only game with this issue, so I think it's just the game and not the device.
customer_reviews.author: M J

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the galaxy theme. I bought it for her birthday and she hasn’t put it down since she received it.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Love the 3D graphics
customer_reviews.text: Received product in great condition and works beautifully. Quick delivery...before date promised.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but no charger
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT COME WITH CHARGER!!!! PLEASE NOTE THAT BEFORE ORDERING!! Aside from that it’s eveything you want from a 3DS plus with a pretty skin
customer_reviews.author: Kelly J Fleet

customer_reviews.title: Would reccomend.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this! He had the older model and wanted an upgrade, now we play together (of course I got his old one!) Battery life is good. Screen is amazing. Love the galaxy skin to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Fun and entertaining, good time-killer.
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful hand-held gaming console that I spend almost every minute of every day playing with. I bought this as a birthday gift for myself and don't regret it one bit; though the fact that I had to buy a charger separately was super annoying, the device itself is exceptional and its design/colors are very sleek and pretty. I purchased a copy of "Pokémon Sun" alongside my 3DS XL and have over 200+ hours on my second save file; but I'm still not going to be done playing anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Kelechian

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo at its best
customer_reviews.text: Needed another ds for my collection (10 now) and it fits the bill perfectly. The other ones are limited editions so it’s nice to have one I can actually play. Battery life is amazing compared to the regular new 3ds. Nintendo has always made very good handhelds and their 3ds line is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: PlasmaNugget

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful system
customer_reviews.text: The system works great. I already started to use it, it's beautiful and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lydenisse

customer_reviews.title: Gamer
customer_reviews.text: Works good again does not hold charge very long. Disappointed in that. Thought these games were supposed to last for hours.
customer_reviews.author: B. Segal

customer_reviews.title: Great Nintendo case.
customer_reviews.text: Great Nintendo case holds plenty of other things besides the Nintendo.
customer_reviews.author: Trinkets35

customer_reviews.title: I love the Galaxy design
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present to myself. I love the Galaxy design. It is very vibrant and nice to look at. I retired my old 3DS to my shelf and started to use this one as soon as it came.!
customer_reviews.author: Jarred Wright

customer_reviews.title: Scam
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a new system and received an obviously used one. No cellophane wrapping and fingerprints on the screen. The screen fades from brighter to darker when the unit is on. I'd already paid $30 for games before I noticed the defect. Ripped off....
customer_reviews.author: kenneth kilmer

customer_reviews.title: Best nintendo 3DS ever!
customer_reviews.text: The 3DS arrived brand new only thing it's from singapore arabian type so far I haven't had any problems playing my games on it so ad long as it lets me play them it's all good.
customer_reviews.author: HavvkeyeMihavvk

customer_reviews.title: Seriously love this! The inside isn't a matte finish but ...
customer_reviews.text: Seriously love this! The inside isn't a matte finish but it has saddle sparkles which adds more depth to the design! I love the 3d now as well. If you have wanted to get a second 3ds xl / replace one you should totally get the new one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Fair warning. The C stick needed warming up before I could press down on it. Took like a like a day. So don't panic if this happens to yours. Got one for a friend and his was perfect out the box.
customer_reviews.author: Arkhemiel

customer_reviews.title: ... shown in the photo cover but it’s still a pretty purple. As for the quality it shows decent ...
customer_reviews.text: The galaxy color is a little darker than shown in the photo cover but it’s still a pretty purple. As for the quality it shows decent graphics for games. I haven’t tried out the 3D part of this console but it has my hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great condition, can't actually see a scratch on it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great condition, can't actually see a scratch on it and works perfectly. Will have to stress the battery a bit to see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Husband was very satisfied and came on time in good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: the system worked great for a bit, but now it wont read any game cartridges and I feel like Ive just waisted my money
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, son saved all of his money for over a year to buy this. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brooks

customer_reviews.title: This 3DS has been wonderful so far
customer_reviews.text: This 3DS has been wonderful so far. It works much faster than my original (old 3DS) and I love the galaxy design on it. The controls respond properly and I've found nothing to complain about with it. Just make sure to get a larger capacity microSD card for it, as it does come with a 4GB card, but those only hold so much.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel W

customer_reviews.title: If you're considering buying this, do it!!
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this 3DS. I'm 24 and I have wanted a DS since I was probably 16 years old. I love video games and Galaxy themed items, so this was a no-brainer for me. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Harper

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased:D
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad that I spent the extra money on a brand new model rather than used. Also glad that I purchased a north american model. Well worth the money spent..
customer_reviews.author: Reba

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within a week of purchase. Screen kept ...
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working within a week of purchase. Screen kept going in and out and now doesn't come on at all. I reached out to see if they would replace it and have been waiting for a response for over 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets!
customer_reviews.text: I do not regret my decisions at all. I am absolutely in love with this 3DS - the jump from my original 3DS to the NEW 3DS was well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Desirae

customer_reviews.title: SCAM!!!!!! DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was given a broken product that when you put a gamecard in it does not load the game. When I had first got it I expected for it to be clean but it was not even close. When I turned it on it was not factory reset to I had to call Nintendo to turn off the parental controls to reset. Horrible. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Diedre M.

customer_reviews.title: My little sister loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Christmas and let me just say, it was the best gift under the tree. If you are buying this just know that you also have to buy the ac adapter as it does not come with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Son loved it and would not stop playing. Be warned that a charger does not come with it
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sink

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive to not have a charger.
customer_reviews.text: It works great and is beautiful, just wish it would of came with a charger like it does when you purchase it in the store. I felt like I paid too much for just the device. I definitely should of searched around 1st.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Ward

customer_reviews.title: Even Grown Kids Enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 22 year old son. He really liked it. He said the imaging on the front was great and he like the new style unit.
customer_reviews.author: yvette052977

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you don't live in the Americas
customer_reviews.text: Got the item and tried playing a game however sadly I couldn't get any joy out of this item since I wasn't aware of the region lock feature that Nintendo implements on the games and consoles, so I had to return this amazing item. It would be nice if it was stated in the item description that the item only works with games from the Americas.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Screen started freezing after two months. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Purchased brand new. Within two months screen started freezing while playing games. Now I’m overseas and stuck with a product I paid almost $300 for.
customer_reviews.author: Jblade17

customer_reviews.title: Easy handheld gaming system.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. We love the uniqueness of the color.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet

customer_reviews.title: other than that in perfect working condition and I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: It came with a loose hinge that drives me insane, other than that in perfect working condition and I absolutely love it. The floppy hinge just drives me up a wall.
customer_reviews.author: Riley Budzien

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter's birthday. She very specifically wanted the Galaxy style model Nintendo 3DS XL. Easy to use right out of the box. Yes there's no charger. However, it very clearly states that in the description. Fortunately, we have several old Nintendo DS chargers lying around. The price was similar to what I've seen in retail stores, but a lot of the stores around us had sold out or didn't carry this model. I got it from Amazon in about 3 days with no shipping.
customer_reviews.author: GennyLeigh

customer_reviews.title: Wont boot up
customer_reviews.text: After a few months of light gaming the product wont even turn on. It stays on a black screen.
customer_reviews.author: SinnaJean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: MY GRAND SON LOVED THIS. PLAYS IT ALL THE TIME.
customer_reviews.author: RHONDA MANKE

customer_reviews.title: Good shape, scratch on screen and not wiped before sending
customer_reviews.text: The screen has a scratch on it and it wasn’t wiped clean before shipping and there was a few recordings that I wasn’t too pleased that my 6 yo discovered. I guess I should have checked that myself first but I assumed it would have been wiped before sending
customer_reviews.author: Megan K. Brame

customer_reviews.title: This is really high quality. I wasn't keen on ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really high quality. I wasn't keen on the SD card needing a zero philips screw driver, but now I am since it makes it so there's less stuff on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Fier

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase! Great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my grandson (8 yo) and he absolutely loves it! I thought the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great... Love it. Arrived as said.. Will buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Iggmaster

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived 1 day early in good and padded packaging. The item is exactly as described, used like new, impeccable condition. Came with 3/4 charge. I would believe it if someone told me it was brand new. I am very happy with this purchase, the galaxy design is pretty cool as well.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Charatz

customer_reviews.title: My favorite handheld
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth (?) 3DS, and I love it. Amazing game library. I recommend getting the charging cradle.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Now i want one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's birthday and he loves it! The case is beautiful and the 3D feature is amazing. Now I want one!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get lost in. Galactic cover is nice as well.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, none of the buttons have broken on it yet and I've noticed slim to none when it comes to button wear so far. I would recommend getting a zip-close hardcase. I certainly got my money's worth out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce H.

product_meta.title: Nintendo New 3DS XL - Galaxy Style
product_meta.description: Edition:Galaxy| Configuration:without AC AdapterTHE NEXT DIMENSION IN ENTERTAINMENT The New Nintendo 3DS XL system combines next-generation portable gaming with super-stable 3D technology and added control features. Take 3D photos, connect with friends, and enhance your gaming experiences with added amiibo support. The New Nintendo 3DS XL system plays all Nintendo DS games. Nintendo DS games will not appear in 3D. AC Adapter sold separately. New Nintendo 3DS XL uses the same AC adapter as Nintendo DSi, Nintendo 3DS and 2DS. 3D Mode recommended for Ages 7+
feature_bullets: The New Nintendo 3DS XL system plays all Nintendo DS games; Nintendo DS games will not appear in 3D
AC Adapter sold separately; New Nintendo 3DS XL uses the same AC adapter as Nintendo DSi, Nintendo 3DS and 2DS

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,164 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
